Control Name: 18.1.4 Privacy and protection of personally identifiable information
Control Statement: Data protection and privacy shall be ensured as required in relevant legislation, regulations, and, if applicable, contractual clauses

control_attributes.Clause_Category: 18.1 Compliance with legal and contractual requirements
